channel.title: Posts on José M. Reis
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on José M. Reis

item.title: Exploring UK's Unpublished International Agreements
item.description: “Sykes-Picot”, Trotsky, and the Prohibition Against Secret International Agreements “Trotsky-leaks” and its impact on public opinion The prohibition against secret International Agreements Some theory: why write it down? or why secret treaties are quite puzzling Starting point: a (very) brief intro to compliance theory The puzzle: most mechanisms of compliance are not applicable to secret treaties, so why bother? Empirical analysis of UK’s unpublished International Agreements Preparing the data Data wrangling Exploratory data analysis 1: UK treaty practice Exploratory data analysis 2: UK’s treaty-publicity practices Hopefully, something for every one on this one: some Law, some International Politics, some History, and some R Programming and data analysis.

item.title: Blog posts coming soon
item.description: A couple of blog posts related with my research and R coming soon, still very much a work in progress though…
